name: Radish Rush
description:
Save your radish harvest from the kamikaze artist aliens.

Use Left and Right to move

Use Up and (Left or Right) to aim 

Use Up to throw a Radish

Use Down to plant a Radish

And finally, restore dead soil by planting a Blue Orb on it

We are a group from college who makes games as a hobby. Thanks for playing!!

Have a nice day, Tostym8 and RoughSkin
